Institution Name: ST. ALBERT INSTITUTE, KAFANCHAN, KADUNA STATE (AFFL TO UNIVERSITY JOS)
Direct Entry Requirements:
Two (2) “A” Level Passes in Arts or Social Sciences Subjects 

NCE/ND/First Degree (Second Class Lower)
UTME Requirements: Five (5) “O” Level Credit Passes to include English and Mathematics (Not more than two sittings in WAEC/NECO)
Subjects: English Language, any three (3) Arts or Social Sciences Subjects
